title: You figured Vayne wouldn’t thrive in a meta where games ended so quickly
body: Cause she’s a scaling champion right? :thinking:

replies.body: She’s just horribly designed In late too, even if she did reach six items at what point is two shotting someone considered acceptable level of gameplay?

> [{quoted}](name=TSM Piccaboo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-08T15:35:46.313+0000)
>
> She’s just horribly designed In late too, even if she did reach six items at what point is two shotting someone considered acceptable level of gameplay?

Zoe 1 shots .

No she doesnt.

She lands her E, then Qs you and probably needs an auto to proc her passive too.

She either two shots or three shots you. She does not one shot, i dont know where you're getting that from.

I have been one shotted by a Zoe Q one game
Of course she needs to get fed first
No E required
Just one really long range disjointed q

> [{quoted}](name=JamesTheMage15,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-08T20:05:42.828+0000)
>
> No she doesnt.
> 
> She lands her E, then Qs you and probably needs an auto to proc her passive too.
> 
> She either two shots or three shots you. She does not one shot, i dont know where you're getting that from.

actually if a Zoe gets really fed she can 1 shot with just a q. I played a game as jhin where by late game Zoe had over 900 ap, she didnt even need to land her e to take out my entire health bar. 

And yeah, she was fed, people always do crazy damage when fed. But when you say she doesn't one shot and leave it at that with no other clarifications, you therefore imply that in 100% of situations, not matter how fed, zoe can't one shot. You never said that, but your word choice implied such. 

If she gets fed she can one shot. Its not a 2 or 3 shot 100% of the time like you imply with your choice of words and lack of specifications.

Jhin can one-shot too.

Most carry champions can one-shot if they get fed and/or are targeting a squishy champion.

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=00000000000000020000,timestamp=2018-01-09T21:11:48.256+0000)
>
> Jhin can one-shot too.
> 
> Most carry champions can one-shot if they get fed and/or are targeting a squishy champion.

Thats true too. 

Meanwhile I mained old {{champion:45}} and I cri every time I see someone one shot someone. I miss when I could right click you and your entire health bar was gone, why does Veigar get that taken away from him but champs like {{champion:142}} and {{champion:202}} are allowed to one shot with a single ability/click? Even a fed af late game veigar with 1000 ap cant oneshot with his ult anymore cuz when they are full hp the ap ratio is lower then 100%, RIP old veigar ult. 

On another note, I've seen a couple videos of people building crit on SA {{champion:141}} and one shotting an entire champion with a single auto. 

Also Anklespankin did a video on ap {{champion:39}} recently and there was one point where one ability one shot someone in that video, though I dunno too much about Irelia so idk how the ap build does that.

Sorry, only just saw this (my updates page doesn't work).

Yeah it kinda sucks for Veigar.  At least he gets more AP now though.
This
Plus, she probably needed her ult for that

> [{quoted}](name=Perniicious,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2018-01-08T22:44:44.633+0000)
>
> with all abilities, Vayne just autos

Vayne hasn't 1 shot anyone for like 5 patches now.
But Zoe's one shot can be dodged. You can't dodge autos, especially when the champion has a passive that makes it so you can't outrun them either.

How about staying out of range? i mean its 550 range, u could be anywhere else on the map, cant be that hard. Zoe can litterally remove carries from half the screen away with a single 0-risk high reward combo.  But herp derp vayne op, plz nerf.

"a passive that makes it so you can't outrun them either."

If she gets close to you, you aren't getting away and almost nobody can 1v1 her (she can even with against multiple champions on her own).

Finally, Vayne is blatantly op right now.  She basically has to be op to me meta because of how stat-checky she is.

> If she gets close to you

You can use same argument against {{champion:75}} , if he gets close to you..

How about staying out of range and poking {{champion:67}} ? cant be that hard, seems like {{champion:142}} can do that job lel
Maybe if the Vayne has terrible reactions.  Her Q is on such a short cooldown that she should never get picked off by something as telegraphed as Zoe's E.
Maybe use some skill and predict where she gonna q? or is it too hard for zoe? maybe zoe needs buff now? lol

I'm not saying Zoe needs buffs or anything.  I'm saying that's not such a good matchup for Zoe (unless the Vayne is using her Q while farming with no allies around).

Also you can't predict where she'll Q because she'd Q in response to your E.  Unless you're at short range (in which case you're either dead or dying), she has plenty of time to see where it's going before using her Q to dodge it.

> [{quoted}](name=TSM Piccaboo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-01-08T15:35:46.313+0000)
>
> She’s just horribly designed In late too, even if she did reach six items at what point is two shotting someone considered acceptable level of gameplay?

When you're an assassin that has actual counter play and has to setup that two shot and can be punished by the rest of the team if you do so

Aka something vayne isn't
Exactly how can vayne **NOT** be punished if she tumbles in and Q's your backline?

> [{quoted}](name=Potentia,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2018-01-10T12:35:35.672+0000)
>
> Exactly how can vayne **NOT** be punished if she tumbles in and Q's your backline?

She's invis so no one can see her, and she'll probably just condemn anyone trying to get on her while her tanks cc everyone to keep them off her.

> [{quoted}](name=Lowvyr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=0000000100000000,timestamp=2018-01-10T13:19:54.137+0000)
>
> She's invis so no one can see her, and she'll probably just condemn anyone trying to get on her while her tanks cc everyone to keep them off her.

Not to mention she's gonna have some pretty high attack speed so she'll kill you're backline in a few seconds flat. Hard to punish someone when they just melt your whole team before you can react.
I mean, if she is in range to auto your back line, it means your front line ain’t doing their job

> [{quoted}](name=Spicy Rice,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=000000010000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-12T05:13:31.321+0000)
>
> I mean, if she is in range to auto your back line, it means your front line ain’t doing their job

Probably bc she already two shot em before heading for the back line
Games arent ending quicker the early mid and late phases are shorter. Thus she hits late faster.

Bingo.

We reach end game within 20 minutes now. Whereas end game used to be around 35-40 minutes.

If games WERE ending in the mid game, Vayne wouldnt be nearly as strong.
This. ADCs are doing late game damage with two items now

Eh....no?

Not quite.

What marksmen are doing differently is static shiv, that was the start of this entire botlane burst fiesta x)

And the reason botlanes tend to be focused by junglers and midlaners? First blood tower....and botlane's tower doesn't have any protection, one good or lucky gank and suddenly a team is up 900+gold.

Give those 900 to a marksman like Vayne and she takes it along with her farm and buys static shiv along with IE sometime soon, and then with her stealth+Q she will go on to take 3/4ths of someones health in a single crit. 

Anyone that isn't a full on tank*

> Give those 900 to a marksman like Vayne and she takes it along with her farm and buys static shiv along with IE sometime soon, and then with her stealth+Q she will go on to take 3/4ths of someones health in a single crit. 

This is exactly what I meant by late game damage with two items. You're saying no, and then agreeing with me

Games were never 35-40 minutes long.
Unless you're talking about S1, when literally no one knew how to play League and close out games.
Yes, they absolutely were that long. in S1-5, 35+ minute games were commonplace.

No, they weren't.
Don't confuse having a few games that end at those times as the norm.
They aren't the baseline. And Riot has nothing against games lasting longer than 30 minutes but if every game is over 30 minutes long and then close games even longer, that's the problem. Same as games lasting 20 minutes but if the game is a loss already, i'd rather they end quickly than drag out for 30+ minutes with the same outcome for my team.

Being stuck in a downward spiral is never fun it's an inevitable loss.
You're just wasting time.

You clearly did not play back then.

Games were not like they are now. Games were NOT lost at 20 minutes and then played out until 40 minutes with no hope of comeback.

Games actually had back and forths. There were openings for both teams to make plays and win a game over the course of, yes, 35-40 minutes. 

Youre confusing games lost at 20 minutes to games where you are behind at 20 minutes. Just because you are losing does not mean you have lost. Or it shouldnt. Right now that is what it means because the game balance is fucked right now and there is so much damage it is nearly impossible to come back from a downward spiral.
nah man ADC's are now strong at all stages of the game, solid gameplay balance right der

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze II Yasuo ,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-08T14:45:01.594+0000)
>
> Cause she&rsquo;s a scaling champion right? :thinking:

Crit scaling items are too cheap and have been for a while.
Its not a matter of it being too cheap they are too effective. because raising the price for your cannon is only gonna delay my death by minutes when all i get is a T shirt the be called armor.
This is an items issue not a vayne issue.
That champion is an 'issue' since release.

uh.. she was practically forgotten season 4/5 from what I remember. Her power curve comes from crit items being way too inexpensive. If the prices and power to items changed she'll shift back to onhit and be more balanced.

Forgotten? Excuse me?

This is the gameplay board. These people will not forget about Vayne until she's at a 40% win rate.

BITCH PLEASE
_
30%_

{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
Vayne herself isn't the problem. It's that her counters have been nerfed and now botlane is a fiesta. I don't even see people playing Draven (which one of the best if not the best) against Vayne.

Do you know which ADC absolutely bullies Vayne in lane? Lucian. Do you know which champion Riot nerfed to the ground without any real reason (other than he was crowding out other midlane picks in LCS)? Lucian. 

Fun fact: Lucian also bullies Twitch in lane.

Additional Fun fact: "Late game" Lucian isn't a problem. He cannot kill you in "3 autos" like Vayne and Twitch and must commit fully (i.e., be within range of several melee champions' engage abilities), unless of course, he is extremely fed.

> [{quoted}](name=TsunamiSS,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=jxgrkUel,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2018-01-08T20:12:54.573+0000)
>
> Do you know which ADC absolutely bullies Vayne in lane? Lucian. Do you know which champion Riot nerfed to the ground without any real reason (other than he was crowding out other midlane picks in LCS)? Lucian. 
> 
> Fun fact: Lucian also bullies Twitch in lane.
> 
> Additional Fun fact: "Late game" Lucian isn't a problem. He cannot kill you in "3 autos" like Vayne and Twitch and must commit fully (i.e., be within range of several melee champions' engage abilities), unless of course, he is extremely fed.

Lucian isn't a late game champ.

I think the point is that the dominant laners should be champions like Lucian instead of Vayne/Twitch.

Also, Lucian is totally a late game champion. He's not hyper-carry, but he still scales really well compared to most not-ADC (by dint of being an ADC).

This is an incorrect way of thinking. Heres what i mean:

What you say: Vayne is strong -> People die easily -> Games are fast.

What it is: People die easily -> Vayne gets fed -> Gets gold -> Has items faster -> Games are fast.

A fast meta isnt defined by being a fast meta, a fast meta is when people die so fast people get fed fast and the game ends. So the issue isnt "VayNe LaTE gAmE CaHmPOon? LEL" Its the fact that the meta is so fast ADCs reach late game by 20 min instead of 40.

Note: Im not saying whether or not Vayne is weak, i actually havent seen her. Just the fact that the notion of "Vayne shouldnt be strong in a fast meta" is incorrect.
i havent see vayne either but that is largely because she is banned by me and my enemy in 70% of my games and banned in 90% of my games the 10% she slips through they is played in 50% of them.
I don't understand why people think Vayne is a late game champ.  As a support main, I've gotten PLENTY of Vaynes fed in the first ten minutes.

A proper pick for support can get *any* non-trolling ADC fed. No matter how supposedly late-game-oriented said ADC is.

A Blitz is *going* to get his or her ADC fed, if he lands a hook on someone below 60% a few times.
